title: Navigate forwards to a menu button in reading mode
Navigate backwards to a menu button in reading mode
Request information about a menu button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Actions' menu button, read information about the menu button.

title: Open a menu in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Actions' menu button, open the menu.
assertions: roleMenu nameActions roleFocusedItemMenuItem nameFocusedItemAction1 positionFocusedItemMenu1 numberItemsMenu4

title: Open a menu to the last item in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Actions' menu button, open the menu.
assertions: roleMenu nameActions roleFocusedItemMenuItem nameFocusedItemAction4 positionFocusedItemMenu4 numberItemsMenu4

title: Request information about a menu item in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Action 1' menu item, read information about the menu item.

title: Navigate to the first item in a menu in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Action 4' menu item, navigate to the first menu item.

title: Navigate to the last item in a menu in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Action 1' menu item, navigate to the last menu item.

title: Navigate to an item in a menu by typing a character in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Action 1' menu item, type a character to navigate to a different menu item.

title: Activate a menu item in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Action 1' menu item, activate the menu item.

title: Close a menu in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Action 1' menu item, close the menu.
